top_stories.title: Meta just bought Manus, an AI startup everyone has been talking about
top_stories.description: Meta says it'll keep Manus running independently while weaving its agents into Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp, where Meta's own chatbot, Meta AI, is already available to users.
top_stories.author: Connie Loizos
top_stories.content: Meta says it'll keep Manus running independently while weaving its agents into Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp, where Meta's own chatbot, Meta AI, is already available to users.

top_stories.title: NIH establishes nation's first dedicated organoid development center to reduce reliance on animal modeling
top_stories.description: The Standardized Organoid Modeling Center aims to produce standardized protocols for organoid research, addressing reproducibility challenges.
top_stories.content: The Standardized Organoid Modeling Center aims to produce standardized protocols for organoid research, addressing reproducibility challenges.

top_stories.title: AI agent-driven browser automation for enterprise workflow management
top_stories.description: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]
top_stories.author: Kosti Vasilakakis
top_stories.content: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. top_stories.title: How to Build Production-Grade Agentic Workflows with GraphBit Using Deterministic Tools, Validated Execution Graphs, and Optional LLM Orchestration
top_stories.description: In this tutorial, we build an end-to-end, production-style agentic workflow using GraphBit that demonstrates how graph-structured execution, tool calling, and optional LLM-driven agents can coexist in a single system. We start by initializing and inspecting the GraphBit runtime, then define a realistic customer-support ticket domain with typed data structures and deterministic, offline-executable tools. We show […] The post How to Build Production-Grade Agentic Workflows with GraphBit Using...
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
top_stories.content: In this tutorial, we build an end-to-end, production-style agentic workflow using GraphBit that demonstrates how graph-structured execution, tool calling, and optional LLM-driven agents can coexist in a single system. top_stories.title: Guardz Report: Nearly Half of U.S. Small Businesses Hit by Cyberattacks
top_stories.description: 80% of SMBs with a formal incident response plan in place were able to avoid major damage during an attack – highlighting the need for support from MSPs According to a report published today by Guardz, the cybersecurity platform empowering Managed Service Providers (MSPs) to protect small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs), almost... The post Guardz Report: Nearly Half of U.S. Small Businesses Hit by Cyberattacks first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
